work.name: Lona
work.summary: A collection of tools for building design systems and using them to generate cross-platform UI code, Sketch files, and other artifacts

work.name: Sketch
work.summary: Devised and implemented a plan to improve the plugin ecosystem of Sketch (leading UI design tool). That involved everything from writing an API, developer tools, documentation and tutorials to speaking to conferences and creating plugin examples
highlights: Built an stable API which allow plugins to work across multiple Sketch versions
Created a bunch of internal tools for the QA team and CS team

work.name: Enki
work.summary: Developed the application but also set up the infrastructure and the Continuous Integration / Deployment system
highlights: Took the React application from 100 to 200,000 users
Managed a team of 5 other developers

volunteer.summary: Non-profit initiative that facilitates the growth of a diverse tech community by running regular programming workshops

publications.name: Design engineers
publications.summary: In the last couple of decades, “people who code” went from “developers” to “software engineers”, and in the next couple of decades, “designers” will become “design engineers” in a similar fashion

publications.name: Yes, Designers can use git too!
publications.summary: How to go from a messy Dropbox folder to a modern collaborative workflow using git

projects.name: Timelense
projects.description: Capture and share moments in a meaningful, personal way with Timelense: the postcard that comes to life with a sprinkle of magic (and a touch of AR)

projects.name: Medium to Own Blog
projects.description: Switch from Medium to your own blog in a few minutes.

projects.name: Slacking Pigeon
projects.description: Lets chat in real time with your users directly from Slack. No need for another tool, everybody can jump in to answer a question.

projects.name: Kactus
projects.description: Version Control for designers, allowing the same engineering workflow as developers, on the same platform

projects.name: Skpm
projects.description: Command line tool to streamline the Sketch plugin developer experience
highlights: Now the official tool for plugin developers
